Event.name: Exclude_member
Event.definition:
<def-root>A former <fen>Member</fen> of a <fen>Group</fen> ceases to be a member as a result of the action of an <fen>Authority</fen> within the <fen>Group</fen>. (In directly democratic <fen>Group</fen>s, the <fen>Authority</fen> may consist of the <fen>Group</fen> itself as a voting whole.)
<ex><fex name="Authority">The priest</fex> <t>excommunicated</t> <fex name="Member">Henry</fex> <fex name="Group">from the church</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Member
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who used to belong to a <fen>Group</fen>.
<ex>I 'm afraid that <fex name="mm">I</fex> was <t>expelled</t> from the Society after they found I endorsed him.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Group
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A set of people standing in a semi-permanent relationship together.
<ex>Giles bemoaned his <t>expulsion</t> <fex name="Group">from the Future Farmers of America</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Authority
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An empowered subset of the <fen>Group</fen> which decides to expel its former <fen>Member</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>A cause, reason, or other explanation for the exclusion of the <fen>Member</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Means by which the <fen>Authority</fen> excludes the <fen>Member</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Depictive</fen> describes a participant in the exclusion event.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: excommunicate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: officially exclude from participation in the sacraments and services of the Christian Church.

lexUnit.name: excommunication.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of officially excluding from participation in the sacraments and services of the Christian Church.

lexUnit.name: exclude.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: To treat a member as not being or no longer being a member of the salient group.
